text: aur (ai rasool) us vakt qo yaad karo jab tumhaare paravaradigaar ne farishton se kaha ki main (apana) ek naeb zameen mein banaanevaala hoon (pharishte taajjub se) kahane lage kya too zameen aise shakhs ko paida karega jo zameen mein fasaad aur khoonreziyaan karata phire haalaanki (agar) khaleepha banaana hai (to hamaara jyaada haq hai) kyonki ham teree taareeph va tasabeeh karate hain aur teree paakeezagee saabit karate hain tab khuda ne pharamaaya isamen to shak hee nahin ki jo main jaanata hoon tum nahin jaanate
